ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Iksar Illousion :\
ygData.msgSnippet: agreed.  kill everything in the area around the bandit camp and a ton warrior will eventually spawn.  I saw about 2 ton warriors per hour and 1 in 4 had a
ygData.messageBody:
agreed. kill everything in the area around the bandit camp and a ton
warrior will eventually spawn. I saw about 2 ton warriors per hour and 1 in
4 had a totem.

You'll want to keep the area around the bandit camp cleared with the outer
perimeter being a circle with radius of the distance from the camp to the
water. There were a few blue things through 29ish I think and the ton
warriors and shaman are level 26ish.

Azara Sparklemeister, 30 enchanter
Povar, Sacrament

- Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: refplace@... [mailto:refplace@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 11:57 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Iksar Illousion :\



Go to the Iksar bandit camp and hang out in that area.
